annotation.description: This annotation is used to mark a pattern as a query definition for a query-based feature.
annotation.name: QueryBasedFeature

annotationparameter.description: The name of the EStructuralFeature that the query will serve (default: pattern name).
annotationparameter.name: feature

annotationparameter.description: The name of the parameter that is the source of the derived feature (default: type of first parameter).
annotationparameter.name: source

annotationparameter.description: The name of the parameter that is the target of the derived feature (default: type of second parameter).
annotationparameter.name: target

annotationparameter.description: Possible values: single, many, sum, iteration (default: feature.isMany?many:single)
annotationparameter.name: kind

annotation.description: This annotation is used to mark a pattern as a surrogate query definition for a feature.
annotation.name: Surrogate

annotationparameter.description: The name of the EStructuralFeature that the query will serve (default: pattern name).
annotationparameter.name: feature
